name: Chatango Dark Theme
description:
A Dark Theme for Chatango fullscreen chatrooms using the Stylish browser extension for Firefox.
Great for chatting in plain sight at the office, or covertly elsewhere.
additional_info:
Tested in Firefox Quantum 58.0 (64-bit) using Stylish 3.0.1

Ver.002 - updated css3 - profile icons are now 80% greyscale to achive a more subtle look.
